name: Undead Fighters
description: You can summon a vex every 10 seconds to fight for you, but they will die after some time. [Secondary]

actions.command: execute as @s run summon vex ~ ~0.5 ~ {Team:illagers,HandItems:[{Count:1,id:iron_axe},{}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:5,Amplifier:1,Duration:999999},{Id:20,Amplifier:0,Duration:999999}]}
execute as @s run summon vex ~ ~0.5 ~ {Team:illagers,HandItems:[{Count:1,id:iron_axe},{}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:5,Amplifier:1,Duration:999999},{Id:20,Amplifier:0,Duration:999999}]}
execute as @s run summon vex ~ ~0.5 ~ {Team:illagers,HandItems:[{Count:1,id:iron_axe},{}],ActiveEffects:[{Id:5,Amplifier:1,Duration:999999},{Id:20,Amplifier:0,Duration:999999}]}
execute at @e[type=vex] run summon snowball ~ ~1.5 ~ {Motion:[0.0,-1.0,0.0],damage:0,life:1200}
playsound minecraft:entity.illusioner.prepare_mirror master @s ~ ~ ~ 10 0.18
execute at @e[type=vex] run summon snowball ~ ~1.5 ~ {Motion:[0.0,-1.0,0.0],damage:0,life:1200}
